info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lackawanna and northeastern Luzerne Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pittston, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittston, Exeter, Dupont, Laflin, Yatesville, Springbrook Corners, Yostville, Fells Corners, Inkerman and Westminister. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 175 and 175A and B. Interstate 476 near 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
